data.name: AKUMA: Cyberpunk Rhythm Action
data.detailed_description:
Nova Tokyo Awaits

Nova Tokyo has risen from the ruins of the old capital like a phoenix.
While it lives a mechanical life, the city-hackers — specialists in hacking corporate systems — test their skills in ultimate challenges.
Those who are reckless enough, dare to participate in clandestine competitions — the so-called Hackons.
The purpose of these competitions is to crack the security systems of the other hacker.
Their bodies are at stake: lose in a Hackon and you must strip in front of the rival.

AKUMA! Bone-crashing rhythm action levels in a mix with gorgeous visual novel pieces. All together AKUMA brings us an unique cyberpunk setting that combines Japanese city pop culture, beautiful girls and the aftermath of popped financial bubbles and the highlights of a futuristic capitalist society at its prime!

Become a City Hack Champion

The chief event of this risky sport is held by the sukeban girls from the Chuusei-Dan Gang under the lead of Akari, a tough nut to crack.
She is vigilant to ensure that the participants comply with the Hakon ethic - the ban on distributing photos of naked rivals.

The champion of this event is rightfully considered to be the most powerful hacker in Nova Tokyo.
For many years, this title has been held by a talented hacker called Mira. She's not going to give up even under the pressure of other worthy opponents!

One of them is Typhoon, a promising city-hacker. Her goal is no less than an absolute victory, she is ready to do anything for that.
What are her motives? Why is winning so important to her? And how far is she willing to go?

Your Rivals


Sakura - Future Pop Idol
A former member of the popular No Satisfaction Girls band, who began a successful solo career.
This cheerful girl is an exemplary idol on the stage. Just.. don't let her playful personality and pretty appearance fool you. Behind the scenes, she is a promising city-hacker. She takes part in Hakons for the thrill despite her agency prohibiting it.
Favorite music genre: Synthwave/Eurobeat
ଘ(੭ˊᵕˋ)੭* ੈ✩‧₊˚


Akari - Sukeban Band Leader
A formidable and stern leader of the Sukeban Gang, who is behind the organization of the Hakon Championship.
She rules them with an iron fist and ensures that no one breaks strict rules. She is always ready to put another hotshot down. It is dangerous to cross her path and few left her without experiencing the bitterness of humiliating defeat.
Favorite music genre: Trance/Psytrance
(ﾒ` ﾛ ´)


Mira - City Hacker Champion
It's virtually impossible to guess that this shy girl is in fact a legendary hacker and current Nova Tokyo champion.
It’s difficult to earn her trust, and her protection from hacking has no equal in the whole city. She had never lost a single Hakon, holding the title for several years. And she is ready to fight to the end to protect her title.
Favorite music genre: IDnB/IDM
(っ˘̩╭╮˘̩)っ


...and Unknown AKUMA Taker
This strange bug continues to haunt the Typhoon no matter what system she gets into.
Who’s that girl? Why is she so interested in Typhoon? And why does she seem so familiar?
Favorite music genre: Lolicore/Breakcore
(ﾒ﹏ﾒ)

Main Game Features

  • Extraordinary story about lost persons in the near future
    Dive in a sophisticated future ruled by the augmentation vogue and hacker trials. Uncover the truth about yourself and find out exactly why you should become a city hack champion.
  • High quality character lore and art
    Original 4 rivals in basic game version with own stories and motivations.
  • Original soundtrack special for AKUMA
    7 bands created perfect tracks of various genres. Intelligent Drum and Bass, Breakcore, Lolicore, Intelligent Dance Music, Synthwave, Psytrance and Dreampunk for stage & screen.
  • More than 3 hours of story, rhythm action gameplay and boss fights
    12 rhythm action levels with 3 variants of difficulty.

    Original Soundtrack

    • Turboslash
    • Samuke
    • Tokyo Rider
    • Girls Eating Boys
    • Danoizz
    • Espo
    • Verum Corner

    Become Legendary City Hacker!

data.short_description: Discover the dark side of the futuristic tech city, where the virtual has merged with the real. Surpass the other hackers of the city. Witness musical gameplay entwine with a fascinating story of fame, success, and the price you have to pay for it.
data.supported_languages:
English, Korean, Russian, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
